channel.title: mysql on My technical gists
channel.description: Recent content in mysql on My technical gists

item.title: How to enable TLS encryption with gmysql PowerDNS backend
item.description: In this post, we will see how to enable TLS encryption with authentication between PowerDNS authoritative server and remote MySQL database.

item.title: Setting up SSL/TLS encryption with official MariaDB docker image
item.description: This post will describe the steps to configure SSL/TLS encryption for a MariaDB container running in Docker.
